QuestData.Title: The Warchief's Fleet
QuestData.Description: Our reinforcements from Kalimdor arrived last night. Three orc gunships full of supplies, weapons and soldiers. Three orc gunships lost to Bloodfang's damned worgen.$B$BHow could an entire orc fleet lose to a small band of enemy combatants that lack any siege weaponry? An important question that you will answer for me.$B$BGather your gear and report to the orc admiral, Hatchet, at the Forsaken Rear Guard, southwest of here.$B$BGet those orcs operational, $n.$B$BI await your full report.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Admiral Hatchet at the Forsaken Rear Guard in Silverpine Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: This fiasco may go down as one of the biggest embarrassments in the history of naval warfare. How did this happen? Drunk happened. That's how.
